original_text: In the thirty-first year of Asa king of Judah, Omri began to reign over Israel, and he reigned for twelve years; six years he reigned in Tirzah.
korean_text: 유다의 아사 왕 제삼십일년에 오므리가 이스라엘의 왕이 되어 십이 년 동안 왕위에 있으며 디르사에서 육 년 동안 다스리니라

sentences.original_text: In the thirty-first year of Asa king of Judah,
Omri began to reign over Israel,
and he reigned for twelve years;
six years he reigned in Tirzah.
